snippet: Senator Marco Rubio offers new energy for the Republican Party, but a challenge is whether voters seek another charismatic first-term senator with a compelling story.
abstract: Sen Marco Rubio announces his candidacy for Republican nomination for president at event in Miami; Rubio stresses his relative youth in his announcement and makes case for newer generation of political leaders, drawing contrast between himself and likely primary opponent Jeb Bush, as well as Democratic contender Hillary Clinton.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and JONATHAN MARTIN

lead_paragraph: Senator Marco Rubio offers new energy for the Republican Party, but a challenge is whether voters seek another charismatic first-term senator with a compelling story.

headline.main: Stressing Youth, Marco Rubio Joins 2016 Field
